title: LoquiLex Settings Schema
description: Schema for LoquiLex application settings with grouping and validation

asr_model_id.title: ASR Model
asr_model_id.description: Choose the default speech recognition model for new sessions.

mt_model_id.title: MT Model
mt_model_id.description: Select the machine translation model for EN→ZH translation.

device.title: Device
device.description: Select the device for model inference.

cadence_threshold.title: Cadence Threshold
cadence_threshold.description: Number of words to accumulate before triggering EN→ZH translation (1-8). Lower values provide faster translation but may be less accurate.

show_timestamps.title: Show Timestamps
show_timestamps.description: Display timestamps in the caption view and include them in exports.

Models.title: Model Configuration
Models.description: Configure speech recognition and translation models
